mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SHOPPING S JOIN MENTORING M ON S.MENTORING_NUMBER = M.MENTORING_NUMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOPPING SET S_STATE = '구매완료' WHERE SHOPPING_NO = #{shopping_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOPPING( SHOPPING_NO, ID, MENTORING_NUMBER, S_DATE, MEN_START, MET_END, S_STATE, MEN_PRICE ) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SHOPPING_NO),0)+1 FROM SHOPPING), #{id}, #{mentoring_number}, sysdate, to_date(#{men_start},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(#{met_end},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), '구매완료', #{mentoring_price} )
